revised_title: Investigating Membrane Potential Differences in Chara Australis
tldr: This article explores the membrane potential differences in the plant species Chara australis. The author investigates the role of a chloride pump and passive diffusion of ions in maintaining these potential differences. The findings suggest that a more complex system, including both passive and active movement of chloride ions, can better explain the observed results.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
